name: Monster Defense - World War
description:
Monster Defense - World War:

Monster Defense - World War – a monster game about insect on iOS.

Do you want to become a Warlords who ruled your kingdom? Do you want to become a legend of the hero?

Monster Defense - World War will give you the exciting experience of Defense game and make your dream come true.

Have many monsters that want to seize your Kingdom and put themself in your position. You have to kill all of them to defense your throne.

Monster Defense - World War was making in a long time, Zonmob has ensured that the app is of the quality that users will have come to expect. Player will have see many high quality animation, adventurous storyline and high energy feel of this game.

Monster Defense leads the user on a unique adventure that is not available on other monster games.

Features of Monster Defense - World War:

* The monsters come in different shapes and sizes with many kinds of move and attack methods.

* Item system is extremely diverse with many different functions

* Beautiful graphics and attractive music

*This game have been designed to be visually appealing to everyone who plays the game.

*There are many maps for you to challenge yourself and make yourself be stronger

* You can become the best defender and put your name in the list of Warlord

How to play the Monster Defense - World War:

*Just fight your way to the top of the Defender

* Shoot monster when they appear before they coming closed

* Making as many ruby as possible to buy weapons to kill more monsters

* Making challenge with diverse level, different theme and more difficult level

* Must be fast because the insect monster appear in all of corners and so crowed if you was late

The game is free to download and has recently been made available for the iOS devices.

Download game and ready to make a fight!
